title: Large, Sunny & Quiet 1 Bedroom in Prime Marina
posting_body: Large, sunny and quiet marina unfurnished 1 bedroom in a prime Marina location.
The building is very clean and well kept up.
Kitchen has a gas stove and lots of cabinet space and area large enough for a table and 4 chairs.
Very large bedroom and good size living room with french doors.
There are 3 bay windows and window seats under each window.
There are four closets, one of which is a huge walk-in closet with window--perfect for an office..
Great location...1 block North of the Chestnut Street shopping district and the 30 express bus (Financial District).
To view a virtual tour of the unit, go to:  <URL>
The exact address is 2301 Francisco Street @ Divisadero.
There 1st OPEN HOUSE will be Sunday (July 31) 3:30pm-4:30pm.
Please just come by then...sorry, the apartment cannot be shown before then.
Applications will be available at this time if you're interested in applying.
